question: Indian Army test-fired Spike anti-tank missiles. The Missiles has been brought into Indian army from which country?
explanation: Spike is an Israeli fire-and-forget anti-tank guided missile and anti-personnel missile with a tandem-charge HEAT warhead, currently in its fourth-generation. Indian Army test-fired Israeli anti-tank missile in Mhow district of Madhya Pradesh. The missiles are called Spike Long-range (LR) anti-tank guided missiles.
